_learningOutcomes.outcome: Describe the open data publication phases
Identify a number of key processes to improve the sustainable publication of open data
Apply a number of open data guidelines to ensure open data becomes sustainable
Identify different characteristics in data and associated data formats
Justify approaches for publishing different types of data in different ways
Describe the data spectrum and how it applies to different types of data
Describe the importance of persistent identifiers for data
Apply the five stars of linked open data to analyse technical quality of data
Explain the difference between the data on the web and the “web of data”
List a number of patterns for discovering open data on and in the web
Create search patterns that enable discovery of open data
Analyse the challenges in using existing open data
Analyse the benefits and drawbacks of publishing data on different open data platforms
Describe the approaches for publishing data
Differentiate between data catalogues, data portals and data management systems”
Publish a number of datasets on different open data platforms
Create a process model for publishing different data sets

_resourcesItems.title: Best Practices
_resourcesItems.description: Slides for the second afternoon session

_resourcesItems.title: Open Refine
_resourcesItems.description: The Open Refine tool is a powerful tool for cleaning messy data

_resourcesItems.title: CSV Lint
_resourcesItems.description: CSVLint helps you to check that your CSV open data file is readable

_resourcesItems.title: CSV Dataset Health Checker
_resourcesItems.description: The CSV dataset health checker is a simple way to check how many variations a CSV open dataset has gone through and whether all of the files are the same or different

_resourcesItems.title: JSON Lint
_resourcesItems.description: JSONLint helps you to check that your JSON open data file is readable

_resourcesItems.title: Publisher's Guide to Open Data Licensing
_resourcesItems.description: How to licence your open data

_resourcesItems.title: Reuser's Guide to Open Data Licensing
_resourcesItems.description: How to understand the licence on your open data

_resourcesItems.title: Publisher's Guide to the Open Data Rights Management
_resourcesItems.description: How to manage the rights of your open data

_resourcesItems.title: Reuser's Guide to the Open Data Rights Management
_resourcesItems.description: How to understand your rights in using open data
